mapper.select: SELECT message_id as messageId, room_id as roomId, sender, nickname, message, message_type as type, sent_at as sentAt FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (room_id, room_name, created_by, room_admin, room_password, max_users, current_users, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{roomName}, #{createdBy}, #{roomAdmin}, #{roomPassword}, #{maxUsers}, #{currentUsers}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT room_id as roomId, room_name as roomName, created_by as createdBy, room_password as roomPassword, max_users as maxUsers, current_users as currentUsers, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_room ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT room_id as roomId, room_name as roomName, created_by as createdBy, room_admin as roomAdmin, room_password as roomPassword, max_users as maxUsers, current_users as currentUsers, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_room_participant WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.member_id as memberId, m.nickname, m.member_image as memberImage, m.social_type as socialType, p.joined_at as joinedAt FROM member m INNER JOIN chat_room_participant p ON m.member_id = p.member_id WHERE p.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY p.joined_at
